page.title: 18LIFE IN EDEN DRIVE.
page.content: At the entrance to{Eden Drive}is the modern{Roman Catholic Church}of{St.} {Anthony.}Next door is{Rayson House} (see Old People's Homes). There are{4} large detached houses and{3}others next door.{No. 22}belongs to{Mr}and {Mrs Tucker.}From{1954}to{1981}it was a butcher's shop. The shop closed partly because more customers began to use {Supermarkets,}and also, the{Tuckers} wanted to retire.The{Tuckers}live next to a store which closed down in{1979.} Opposite them is{Shepheard's}grocer's shop,which closed in{Feb. 1985.}The owners have retired and want to change it into a bigger house. Out of 4 shops only the{Post Office}remains open, relying on the custom of old people living close. Near to the{John Radcliffe Hospital} there is a play park for the children, with swings, a roundabout and a slide.
